body_html: I think I discovered the problem fro my situation. The problem was I am using the standalone Keras. Not the one imported from tendorflow. So the new features of feeding the iterator directly to model.fit() is valid only when you are usingtf.Kerasnot the standalone Keras.
body_text: I think I discovered the problem fro my situation. The problem was I am using the standalone Keras. Not the one imported from tendorflow. So the new features of feeding the iterator directly to model.fit() is valid only when you are usingtf.Kerasnot the standalone Keras.
body: I think I discovered the problem fro my situation. The problem was I am using the standalone `Keras`. Not the one imported from `tendorflow.` So the new features of feeding the `iterator` directly to `model.fit() `is valid only when you are using` tf.Keras `not the standalone Keras.
